[Groovy] Class ExecOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.ssh.CommonOptions
      com.aestasit.ssh.ExecOptions

class ExecOptions
extends CommonOptions

Configuration object holding options used for EXEC (remote command execution) functionality.

Authors:
Andrey Adamovich
